body.p: IAS 35 also adopts a different approach from US GAAP when criteria for classification as discontinued are met after the period‑end but before the financial statements are issued. SFAS 144 requires some disclosure; however, the component is not presented as a discontinued operation. IAS 35 requires the component to be classified as discontinuing.
